summary: This is an email from October 12, 2020, regarding the scanning of case records. The subject line and embedded file reference 'case records scanning', and it appears to be internal correspondence related to document management within the Epstein case context.

events.title: Email regarding case records scanning
events.description: An email was sent concerning the scanning of case records, indicating ongoing document management activities related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An email dated October 12, 2020, discusses scanning of case records.
The email subject is 'RE: case records scanning', suggesting it is part of a chain about document management.
The embedded file is named 'RE:_case records scanning.msg', indicating it is a forwarded or replied email message.
The correspondence appears to be internal administrative communication related to the Epstein case files.
